Troy.Gregor S. and Elizabeth B. Affleck House:
The Gregor S. and Elizabeth B. Affleck House (also known as the Affleck House) is a Frank Lloyd Wright designed Usonian home in Bloomfield Hills, Michigan in Metro Detroit.


== Description and history ==
Construction on the house was completed in 1941.
The house was listed on the National Register of Historic Places on October 3, 1985.
